review: Hooked up quick and easy, updated and was working within a few minutes. excellent quality video, numerous apps, and overall a great buy.
author: Brieanne "Brie"

review: i like it, it is much less expesive then cable you have access to 100 of movies, shows and you can purchase the latest movies. i recommended.
author: norberto tirado

review: Easy hookup and connection to WI-FI.  Didn't take to long to figure the navigational procedure,And the voice command feature works great. Great movie selection.
author: Robert  Thompson

review: I am not able to use most of the apps on here because my cable provider is not on the list.  This was not clearly stated when I bought this device.
author: christina lopez

review: Excellent, was able to side load apps. Show box and xbmc (kodi). I can take a picture or video and upload to the Amazon cloud drive so my son can enjoy it.
author: Blackwhip

review: Since I was already a long time prime member it was a no brainier to add Fire TV.Set up was very easy and I am very happy with the content and picture quality.
author: J. Hefti
